sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: Update the value of a Catalog Item variable.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Takes inputs of the RITM (trigger) from flow, and variable name and variable value strings, then sets that variable to that value. As Flow Designer should do out of the box.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Update Catalog Item Variable
